name: Crashfest - Race Stunt Crash
description:
Crashfest: is a multiplayer online car game. Race against other players, perform stunts and partecipate in spectacular crashes!

!EARLY ACCESS!
Be aware: the game is still under heavy development, you can experience bugs, glitches, and more. Follow us on our social channels to find more about upcoming updates, and to participate in pools and discussions for future updates

SPECTACULAR STUNTS AND CRASHES
Crashfest features spectacular stunts and crashes. The game simulates crashes in the most realistic way possible: damage is visible and performance decreases as damage increases. 
In addition, each damage is separate to make it even more realistic: for example, if you are crushed on the hood, the front wheels will be affected and will be less precise in the steering.

BIG, OPEN-WORLD CITY
Crashfest has a big open-world city. You can explore the city entirely with your friend and other players all around the world. Race, perform stunts, and participate in spectacular crashes with your friends!

FULL OF ACTIVITIES (COMING SOON)
Around the city of Crashfest you can find different activities, from simple races to cop chases, from simple stunts to incredible crashes! It’s up to you to fully explore the city and find every activity and secret.

LOTS OF CARS AND CUSTOMIZATION (CONSTANTLY UPDATED)
We are constantly updating and adding new cars and new content to the game.
You can fully customize your car, from color to kit and even weapons (coming soon)

GAME FEATURES:
Big 3D open-world multiplayer car game. You can fully explore the world.
Different mini-games and activities: race, stunt, simulations.. you name it! You will never get bored, there is so much to do in this game!
Lots of customizations: you can customize everything in your car!
Optimized for mobile phones: this game runs smoothly on mobile phones, it’s been specially optimized to run smoothly even on old devices.
Huge map: a big map for a big game. Explore this huge map, race against other players online, perform incredible stunts and assist in spectacular crashes.
Constantly new updates: stay up to date on the latest news. This game is constantly updated, follow us on our social channels to stay updated on the latest news.
High-quality gameplay: you will have a ton of fun, the controls are easy to understand and highly customizable
Stunning 3d high-quality graphic. The PC’s graphic... On a mobile phone device!

Play online with your friend in this awesome multiplayer online racing car game! Take on activities with your friends, explore the city together, complete races, and more! Up to 4 players per room.

INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS

This is an APK file, you will need to enable security settings. Here is how to install the game on your android device:

  1. Download the APK.
  2. Navigate to your phone settings menu then to the security settings. Enable the "Install from Unknown Sources" option.
  3. Use a file browser and navigate to your download folder. Tap the APK to begin the installation process.
  4. The app should safely install.
